where.if: AND (E.nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR B.nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR B.uid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%'))

if.test: fstDate != null and fstDate != '' and secDate != null and secDate != ''

mapper.select: SELECT A.iuser, A.uid, A.nm, A.email, c.a AS recent_price, SUM(result_price) AS result_price, B.rdt AS recent_rdt , A.rdt AS join_rdt, A.point FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_order B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(if(rdt BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) AND NOW(), result_price, 0)) AS a, iuser FROM t_order GROUP BY iuser ) C ON A.iuser = C.iuser GROUP BY A.iuser LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${recordCount}

SELECT A.iuser, A.uid, A.nm, A.email, c.a AS recent_price, SUM(result_price) AS result_price, B.rdt AS recent_rdt , A.rdt AS join_rdt, A.point FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_order B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(if(rdt BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) AND NOW(), result_price, 0)) AS a, iuser FROM t_order GROUP BY iuser ) C ON A.iuser = C.iuser GROUP BY A.iuser HAVING ${type} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${recordCount}

SELECT A.rdt, A.iorder, E.nm AS productNm , C.quantity, B.uid, B.nm AS userNm , A.spent_point, A.payment_way, A.order_status , C.result_price, A.cdt, B.iuser FROM t_order A inner JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser inner JOIN t_order_product C ON A.iorder = C.iorder inner JOIN t_product_detail D ON C.idetail = D.idetail inner JOIN t_product_master E ON E.iproduct = D.iproduct
GROUP BY A.iorder AND B.iuser

SELECT COUNT(iorder) AS result FROM ( SELECT A.iorder from t_order A inner JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser inner JOIN t_order_product C ON A.iorder = C.iorder inner JOIN t_product_detail D ON C.idetail = D.idetail inner JOIN t_product_master E ON E.iproduct = D.iproduct
GROUP BY B.iuser ) AS A

SELECT CEIL(count(*) / ${recordCount}) AS result FROM t_user C LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.iuser FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_order B ON A.iuser = B.iuser group by A.iuser ) D on C.iuser = D.iuser where ${type} like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
